1 Introduction

Start with installing Nvim-R, vimtex, and ultisnips.

See post “Setting up a minimal neovim…” for details on installing plugins with Neovim.

2 Nvim-R

This plugin is developed by
Jakson A. Aquino jalvesaq@gmail.com and Jose Claudio Faria joseclaudio.faria@gmail.com

The latest version is 0.9.17

Require either Neovim 0.5.0 or Vim 8.2.84.

New options:

  • R_set_omnifunc
  • R_auto_omni
  • R_rmarkdown_args
  • R_objbr_auto_start
  • R_quarto_render_args
  • and R_quarto_preview_args
  • R_debug_center
  • R_term_title.
  • Delete options: R_omni_tmp_file and R_omni_size.

Reuse

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
